</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/area/{id}/child/{childId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This updates the Parent Area entity

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"ID of the Parent","in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"x-ms-summary":"Parent ID"},{"description":"Child (Area) ID of the Parent to be update","in":"path","name":"childId","required":true,"schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"x-ms-summary":"Child (Area) ID of the Parent to be update"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object"}}},"description":"Area that needs to be updated","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes

  label={undefined}

>
